data.eml:eml: The " Taygetis ypthima species group " (Lepidoptera, Nymphalidae, Satyrinae): taxonomy, variation and description of a new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Siewert, Ricardo Russo, Zacca, Thamara, Dias, Fernando Maia Silva, Freitas, Andre Victor Lucci, Mielke, Olaf Hermann Hendrik, Casagrande, Mirna Martins (2013): The " Taygetis ypthima species group " (Lepidoptera, Nymphalidae, Satyrinae): taxonomy, variation and description of a new species. ZooKeys 356: 11-29, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.356.6481, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.356.6481
